name: Heart Hairpin [1]
description: The cute hair clip is made of heart logo, which makes the wearer look small and delicate.

name: Heart of Ice and Fire
description: The giant axe forged by Hsienry. During the period of the Warner God, Loki gave it to Ai Isis, the most powerful warrior of the giant tribe. In a battle, He accidentally hurt his leg by the huge axe in his hand and couldn't stand up anymore. Therefore, This huge axe is known as the "Axe of Curse". The legend goes that its owner will be hurt by the axe if his mind changes. (Better used as the weapon skin)

name: Hector Sword
description: The most powerful sword in the numerous collections of Hillock "the Weapon Collection God". Only the people who has made great contribution to the Temple of the Spirit can be rewarded with the gift of the God, and only the most powerful warriors deserve this glory.
